Galileo Consulting has deep capabilities in innovation and technology management, particularly in the fields of agriculture, biotechnology and chemicals.

## Scope

We undertake engagements related to:

* product development and commercialization;
* business case analysis; 
* technology valuation; and
* writing and editing technical reports

Our strong quantitative skills in R and Excel attracts work:

* designing experiments and analysing the results
* building machine learning models

We participate in dispute resolutions as arbitrators or expert witnesses.
